home.preLogin: DMC offers artists with multi-services including flexible licensing,copyright patrol,  data reporting, legal consulting and promotion with the pioneering technology platform.
home.MonDesc0: DMC presents your music to oceans of online music retailers.  On this platform,
home.MonDesc1: rights owners can be paid swiftly and fairly per stream through flexible licensing and all-channel distributing.
home.MiniDesc0: Red tape  can be reduced intensively, leaving less room for uncertainty or error.
home.MiniDesc1: Artists can focus more on the music itself.
home.RealDesc0: Copyright owners have full access to data reports. You can check the dashboard to keep track of play counts in every online music retailer,
home.RealDesc1: which makes your revenue streams more transparent and reliable.
home.CRDesc0: Cooperating with legal teams dedicated for copyright, our copyright patrol service gives
home.CRDesc1: you solid support to claim your music and guarantee your royalty.

app.Welcome: Welcome to DMC! Now you can check all the information here. Once verified your tracks can be procured by online music retailers and then royalties can be generated.
app.Please: Please send following files to DMC official Wechat account:
app.P1: 1. The ID card number of the indie artist.
app.P11: 1. A full-color copy or photo of your valid business license.
app.P2: 2. A full-color copy or photo of the front side of the ID card.
app.P22: 2. A full-color copy or photo of your organization code certificate.
app.P3: 3. A photo of the indie artist holding the ID card himself/herself.
app.P33: 3. Corporate account ( basic account: bank name, bank account number and name).
app.P4: 4.The bank account of the indie artist ( bank name, bank account number and name).
app.P44: 4. A full-color copy or photo of ID card of the legal representative.
app.P5: 5. Contact details including address and phone number.
app.P55: 5. Contact details including address and phone number.
app.ar_editname: Please fill your full name in here
app.ar_editcountry: Please fill your country of citizenship in here
app.ar_editintro: Please fill your introduction in here
app.upload: Click or drop here to upload your image.
app.kors: Please enter keywords to search by artists or press ‘Enter’ to do fuzzy search.
app.nsrpe: No search results. Press ‘Enter’ to do fuzzy search.
app.tips0: You have applied to purchase the license at a price of
app.tips1: rmb/1000 times. Please waiting for the reply from the rights owners.
